snippet: Justin Casquejo, 16, also voluntarily turned in a 1,200-word essay reflecting on the consequences of his behavior, prompting praise from the judge.
abstract: Justin Casquejo, 16-year-old who was arrested for scaling 1 World Trade Center, is sentenced to 23 days of community service.
lead_paragraph: Justin Casquejo, 16, also voluntarily turned in a 1,200-word essay reflecting on the consequences of his behavior, prompting praise from the judge.

headline.main: Community Service for Teenager Who Climbed Trade Center
headline.print_headline: Community Service for Teenager Who Climbed Trade Center
